subitems: BTC approaching mid-level as planned, i'm watching it closely for a rejection/deviation from the level.
This tell me that the market are cautious, a good sign that it will follow through the trend.

trades.notes: Scalp short, ETH is one of the weaker asset.
Missed my entry on Bitcoin, XRP has been a good BTC beta, I'll squeeze this instead.
Lots of uncertainty, I'm closing my previous XRP short for a small profit, and re-entered higher.
Now this is the cream of the move, closed my earlier trade again for small profit, the moment I sensed a big move coming, I scaled in back with double size.
Woke up in the morning, closing my big size trade, saw an opportunity to squeeze it a bit further as a scalp.

workedWell: Clear identification of market sentiment from both pre-market and social sentiment.
Identified the weaker asset among the others to short.
A very close clutch for trade 3, almost missed the big move.
improvement: I missed my plan for BTC which worked PERFECTLY.
emotional: Sleepless night combined with plenty of market related news/fear.
Lots of scalp due to lack of confidence in my set up.
Still managed to decide on finally drilling the nail on the coffin before sleeping.
adjustments: LESS SOCIAL, focus only the few notification I set.
entries.reflection: Overall, it's a good trading day with some hiccup.
